content:

  "notes": "[11/10/2024 23:21] Update from email:\n- Attendance updated to 45-48 people.\n- Catering preferences confirmed: Plated buffet to include grilled veggies, mixed greens, Mexican bruschetta, French fries, tortillas, steak skewers with grilled veggies, jerk chicken, grilled shrimp, churros, and flan. \n- Special dietary accommodations: Birthday woman and daughters are gluten-free, dairy-free, and no corn (excluding tortillas and bruschetta). \n- Request for an open bar with a limit on drink selections to options not exceeding $15 per drink. \n- Request for setup transition from the Moonlight Lounge (7-10 PM) to the Dining Room until 1 AM.\n\n\n$450 deposit to book; will purchase drink and catering packages. ",
  "createdAt": "2024-11-11T04:11:20.280Z"
}
          
          New Email Content:
          
                        
                            From: Altaz Shajani <draltazshajani@gmail.com>
                            To: Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca>
                            Subject: Re: Excited for your event on November 16th
                            Time: 11/13/2024 22:09 (an hour ago)
                        
                        
                            Actually will be 43 people Open bar but can you limit drinks that we pay for to under $15 or so not top shelf etc Call me if issues 778 838 2170Thank you Altaz Altaz's iPhoneOn Nov 10, 2024, at 10:04 PM, Altaz Shajani  wrote:Hello!We have 45-48 peoplePlated buffet Grilled veggies Mixed greens Mexican Bruschetta French friesTortillas Steak skewers with grilled veggies Jerk chicken Grilled shrimp Churros Flan  The birthday woman and her daughters are gluten free, dairy free and no corn if can let us know besides the tortillas and bruschetta if anything else has those items Wanted open bar - can we put a limit on types of drinks so they’re not ones more than the $15 per drink for Eg like top shelf Phone me if need anything else I believe you said 7-10 pm in the moon lounge and then move to the restaurant till 1 am778 838 2170Altaz's iPhoneOn Nov 10, 2024, at 6:43 PM, Taco Taco  wrote:Hi Dr. Shajani, We're so excited to be hosting your birthday celebration in the Dining Room on November 16th! To make sure everything is perfectly prepared for your big day, we'd love to get a final headcount from you. Can you confirm your selection for catering and guest count? Here's the full details again:We can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questionsTacoTaco Events Team(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca eattaco.ca
                        
                    
          
          Provide a concise but summary of what should be added to the event notes.
          Focus on any changes to: attendance, catering preferences, drink selections, setup requests, 
          timing details, or special accommodations. Only respond with the organizers requets, no introduction.

- Updated attendance to 43 people.
- Request for an open bar with a limit on drink selections to options not exceeding $15 per drink.
